data.title: Nand Prayag Langashu hydroelectric plant
data.meta_description: Nand Prayag Langashu hydroelectric plant is an announced hydroelectric power plant in Chamoli district, Uttarakhand, India.
data.text:
Part of the

Global Hydropower Tracker,

a Global Energy Monitor project.

Nand Prayag Langashu hydroelectric plant is an announced hydroelectric power plant in Chamoli district, Uttarakhand, India.

Project Details

Table 1: Project details for Nand Prayag Langashu hydroelectric plant

Status Commissioning year Nameplate capacity Turbines Technology type Owner Announced[1] 2026 (planned)[2] 100 MW[2] 4 x 25 MW[2] Run-of-river[3] Uttarakhand Jal Vidyut Nigam LTD (UJVNL)[2]

Location

Table 2: Location details for Nand Prayag Langashu hydroelectric plant

Location River Coordinates (WGS 84) Chamoli district, Uttarakhand, India[2] Alaknanda River[2] 30.4877, 79.6705 (approximate)[2]
